item.description:
When: 5:30-7pm, Wed April 7

Where: Jumptap offices, 5th floor, 10 Canal Park, Cambridge, MA 02141 (next to CambridgeSide Galleria)
Directions

What: The whole industry is abuzz about making ad dollars from iPhone/iPad/Android apps but too often, developers include this piece too late in the development cycle. Next Wednesday, we will review the Best Practices around mobile ads and

* User Experience
* Highest Monetization
* Maximizing the value of location
* and of course, how to capitalize on all the iPad has to offer

You bring the questions, we will provide the beer and pizza.

See you next Wednesday!
item.name: Ads in your app: How to generate ad revenue in your iPhone, iPad, & other apps
